## Basic process for working with RStudio

For this example, we are going to create a new RStudio project, download some data, put the data in the project, and make a graph of it using R Markdown. You'll follow this same process any time you start a new project or exercise. You will need to tackle this in class and there are some specific exercises and reflections for each class.
